overview: Michael Angstadt is a technology entrepreneur specializing in strategic web marketing & business process automation. Founding atomni LLC in late 2008, a data-driven web marketing firm in Philadelphia, PA - then M3thod LLC in early 2009 - Michael has continued to grow atomni into a boutique developer of proprietary code-based solutions for data integration, analysis, and decision support. Responsible for several other technology ventures, Michael focuses on building value-adding business tools and thoughtful strategies that improve the accessibility of information for business stakeholders.
